title: Edited tag added.
message: Edited posts show an "(Edited)"- tag next to their date of posting (You can see it now).

title: Design complete
message: Simple design, but it does the job.

title: Site design/functionality is complete.
message: Design and functionality done, app works with react/ts/js frontend, and Nodejs/Expressjs backend, JSON files used for database.
